Text: It is HD (HD is not 720p or more, a little lower what called HD)
sorry Whitebb, but SoNicJensen is correct, your vid is not HD. HD minimum is 720p

Definitely not High Definition.
Quality isn't that great.  But it is watchable.

According to current media quality standards, for a video to be classified as "HD"...it has to be a MINIMUM of 720p. (Yes, I did look it up)

In otherwords, SoNicJesen and xclamation are correct...
